list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move one's hand or a cloth repeatedly back and forth on the surface of (something) with firm pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she rubbed her arm, where she had a large bruise
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô xoa tay, nơi cô có một vết bầm lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she pulled out a towel and gave her head a quick rub
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô rút một chiếc khăn và chà nhanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a difficulty, especially one of central importance in a situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: that was the rub—she had not cared enough
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đó là chà, cô ấy đã không được chăm sóc đủ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in lawn bowling) an uneven patch of ground that impedes or diverts a bowl.
